divs: Sighting DetailsFirst saw it coming from the west, it looked like a fiery object floating in the sky. then as it moved east it stopped and hovered for a few seconds, then it started coming towards me for about 10 seconds, then it stopped and hovered as if it knew I was looking at it. Then it started to slowly move to the eats again. I ran inside and grabbed my mom and my uncle. We all watched it float away before it just vanished somewhere over USD college. I got a really good look at it thru my binoculars for about 1 minute. No sound. Hovered, then moved, changing directions. Looked like molten fire was dripping off of it as it flew slowly by. I didnt want to run and grab my camera in fear that it would go away.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
Summary: Black solid egg shape with orange lights on the bottom
